name: Space Delivery Service
description:
You are a freelance space courier. Your job is simple: you have to pick up packages at one space station and transport them to another one. Easy, isn't it? Oh, and avoid pirates. Pirate raids got frequent recently...

Space Delivery Service is a top-down shooter made for the Bored Pixels Jam within a week. You can chose from a list of given destinations of different difficulties and upgrade your shuttle with the earned money. Unfortunately your ship has a very cheap reactor that cannot power all core system sufficiently, so you have to chose how to distribute energy.

The controls are configurable and can be viewed in the options menu.

I made all assets and game scripts myself.
